subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: WHITE PLAINS, July 19 (AP) — Maria Sharapova, and Venus and Serena Williams are among six past United States Open champions in the women’s field announced yesterday for this year’s tournament.
snippet: WHITE PLAINS, July 19 (AP) — Maria Sharapova, and Venus and Serena Williams are among six past United States Open champions in the women’s field announced yesterday for this year’s tournament.
